Notable Projects

Remote Vehicle Control & Analysis Over CANBus

Designed and implemented a web-based system for remote collection and analysis of vehicle electrical data over CANBus using Carloop. The solution gathers real-time metrics (e.g., engine RPM, speed, fuel level) from a vehicle‚Äôs OBD-II port, transmits them via WiFi to Particle Cloud, and stores them in an InfluxDB time-series database. Data is visualized through Grafana dashboards, enabling live monitoring and analysis of vehicle performance and diagnostics from anywhere.

C++ Particle Cloud Grafana CANBus Carloop Engine Performance Tuning

Real-Time Face Detection & Recognition System

Developed a robust system for real-time face detection and recognition using advanced machine learning techniques. Integrated various algorithms to enhance accuracy and speed, ensuring reliable performance in diverse environments. Implemented a user-friendly interface for easy interaction and visualization of results.

OpenCV Python TensorFlow Model Training

Full-Stack Software Automation

Automating repetitive tasks to improve efficiency using tools like Zapier and Make. Integrated APIs, built custom scripts, and orchestrated workflows to connect disparate systems. Reduced manual workload, minimized errors, and accelerated business processes through end-to-end automation.

API Integration Custom Scripting Workflow Automation

Machine Learning and Data Mining

Developing predictive models and extracting insights from large datasets. Leveraging advanced algorithms and data visualization techniques to drive informed decision-making. Collaborating with cross-functional teams to implement data-driven solutions and optimize business performance.

KNN Decision Tree Random Forest Naive Bayesian Classifiers

FiveM (GTA) Customer Server Development & Scripting

Developed and maintained custom FiveM (GTA V) servers, specializing in advanced LUA scripting and automation. Built immersive gameplay systems, custom jobs, and server-side logic using QBCORE and ESX frameworks. Integrated third-party APIs, optimized server performance, and delivered engaging multiplayer experiences. Demonstrated expertise in resource management, anti-cheat scripting, and seamless deployment of new features for a vibrant player community.

LUA Git HTML, CSS, JavaScript
